qa_pair.question: Find all Cloud Guard problems with CRITICAL severity that are currently in OPEN status. How many such problems exist?
Identify the compartment with the most Cloud Guard problems (all severities combined). What is the compartment name?
List all IAM users that have not logged in within the last 90 days. How many such inactive users exist?
Find IAM policies that grant 'manage all-resources' permission. How many such policies exist?
Identify users with API keys older than 1 year. What is the email address of the user with the oldest API key?
Find all security zones in the tenancy. How many are currently in ACTIVE state?
List Cloud Guard problems of type 'SUSPICIOUS_ACTIVITY'. What is the most common detector rule that triggered these problems?
Find groups with more than 10 members. What is the name of the group with the most members?
Identify compartments that don't have any IAM policies attached. How many such compartments exist?
Find the Cloud Guard problem that has been in OPEN status the longest. How many days has it been open? Round to nearest whole number.
